articles.author: Steven Nelson
articles.title: Fuming families rip Biden, say he did nothing to free US citizen 'hostages' in Saudi Arabia - New York Post
articles.description: The relatives of two American “hostages” in Saudi Arabia tell The Post they’re outraged that President Biden didn’t win their release during his meeting with Mohammed bin Sa…
articles.content: The relatives of two American “hostages” in Saudi Arabia tell The Post they’re outraged that President Biden didn’t win their release during his trip last week to patch up relations with Crown Prince… [+7298 chars]
